en.description: The Telos Boltor is an exclusive version of the Boltor available only from the Arbiters of Hexis. Featuring improved stats and an additional polarity slot, the Telos Boltor also features innate Truth effect.
en.codex: Bring down judgement, with this Boltor crafted by the Arbiters of Hexis.

ru.description: Приведи правосудие в исполнение винтовкой, созданной Арбитрами Гексиса
